profile.greeting: Welcome to Japanese Car Match {{user_first_name}}! Click get started to enjoy our sample automated messaging experience. If you want to build a similar one visit https://fb.me/get-sample-oc

get_started.welcome: Hi {{userFirstName}}! Welcome to Japanese Car Match!
get_started.guidance: At any time, use the menu below to navigate through the features
get_started.help: What we can do to help you today?

leadgen.promo: Hi {{userFirstName}}, finding japanese cars is now easier and more convenient.

curation.class: What class of car are you looking for?
curation.price_range: Great! Let's get started. First, is there a price range in mind?
curation.miles: What is your preferred miles per gallon?
curation.title: Summer collection 2019
curation.subtitle: Featured outfit

chat_plugin.prompt: Thanks for using Japanese Car Match.

fallback.attachment: Thanks for sending this attachment, we can connect you to an agent to review it or we can start over
